info.name: Relics Of Avabur - Rewamped
info.description: My take on a design of RoA with transparent UI + bg image (c) Reltorakii in-game nick 2016 More screenshot: http://imgur.com/a/pdfrS
info.additionalInfo: A big thank you goes to alpha and beta testers, mainly members of Heavy Metal Unicorns, namely: SantaClaus, Smilingninja, Zintaus _____________________________ Use with the default theme of Avabur! I will only support the default theme! _____________________________ Setting your own BACKGROUND: Since v0.5.5 it is possible to set your own background for ANY color scheme my Theme provides. If you do not want to change your background and use the default provided by the color scheme, set this field to default! The format for this field is: url(your_image_url)!important The only thing you should replace in there it the your_image_url, but make it a short one, since UserStyles.org limits this field to 50 characters, so reupload your images to www.imgur.com or any image hosting service that can give you short links. In case you want your image stretchend on the full background of the page, you can try a suggestion posted on the discussion forums https://forum.userstyles.org/discussion/54224/body-image-suggestion _____________________________ ChangeLog: [01.04. 2016] beta release v0.5.5 - added the posibility to set your own background [28.03. 2016] beta release v0.5.4 - added 6 Neon Void color schemes [11.03. 2016] beta release v0.5.2 - added Skyblue color scheme [11.03. 2016] beta release v0.5.1 - added Bloodred color scheme [08.03. 2016] beta release v0.5 - added support for more Color Schemes [06.03. 2016] beta release v0.4.2 - added support for Avabur Enhancer [06.03. 2016] beta release v0.4.1 - fixed small resolution bg resizing when round-by-round option is enabled [06.03. 2016] beta release v0.4 - more fixes, mass scrap confirmation box styling [05.03. 2016] beta realease v0.3.2 - minor fixes, popup fadeout blacker, mentioned messages styling [24.02. 2016] beta release v0.3.1 - small resolution color fixes [24.02. 2016] beta release v0.3 - unified progress bars to one color, various small elements added, small fixes [03.02. 2016] beta release v0.2 - majority of features done [02.02. 2016] alpha release v0.1 - alpha test [31.01. 2016] test release - init release
